features.title: Integrated B2B Sales Data Platform
features.description: Clodura is the integrated B2B sales data platform that helps you generate qualified sales leads, increase b2b lead generation and take care of everything from data to meetings.

features.title: Reach Out With Full Confidence
features.description: Clodura’s company and contact data is verified using proprietary ZeroBounce technology to deliver 95% Accuracy on emails and direct-dial phone numbers.

features.title: Actionable Sales Intelligence
features.description: Clodura’s real-time sales intelligence triggers propels you miles ahead of your competitors. Identify your sales opportunities in advance to stay ahead in the game.

humanityData.title: Manual Process: Daunting Challenge of Time and Accuracy
humanityData.text1: Generating leads through the age-old manual process? We know it takes time to create a precise and qualified list of leads.
humanityData.text2: Make your sales team smarter, and help them generate highly accurate, relevant and qualified leads in no time with Clodura's AI powered, next-gen automated lead gen platform.

promotionData.title: Multiple Tool Usage: Intimidating Augmented Cost of Lead Acquisition
promotionData.text1: Using various tools at different lead generation stages often increases the chance of losing quality leads owing to disjointed integration. Multiple tools also add to the net cost of lead acquisition.
promotionData.text2: Make your sales team more efficient with the power of Intelligence, Data and Outreach, all on one single platform. Experience Clodura.AI and improve your ROI on lead acquisition.
